ygData.subject: Re: The politics of trust.
ygData.msgSnippet: Ice wipes her eye trying to hold back condensation that was forming in her eyes. It s a shame when good bots are wasted on battle when there are so many

Ice wipes her eye trying to hold back condensation that was forming 
in her eyes. "It's a shame when good bots are wasted on battle when 
there are so many better things to be done with the universe."

Lunarpine sensed her fealings and wanted to comfort her. He knew he 
had to continue the facade of her true identity. His thoughts were 
with her enen when he couldn't be. "I'd be there if I could my love." 
he thought. he was relieved when her mood shifted and an 
encouraging "I know" came back from her.

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> GTG. Bell rang.
> 
> ::Kluster/Rex::
> 
> Kluster raises an eyebrow plate. This was new.
> 
> "Er," he says, tapping several buttons, "There were some recent 
> Maximal casualties, yes. I don't think we have any Predacon or 
> Alliance ones recorded."
> 
> He taps several more buttons and the screen displays a list of 
recent 
> Maximal casualties, Snow Cat (that was the name of Logo's cat char, 
> right?) and Striker among them.
> 
> He recieves the transmission from ?3, looking up and seeing Rex 
> already heading out of the room to check it out.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Deciding to take advantage of the opportunity given to her Ice 
> smiles 
> > and replies "Nothing that crucial, I was just wondering about the 
> > situation with the maximals. You know, injuries, damage, survival 
> > rate. I was wondering if I could see the names of recent 
casualties 
> > on both sides if you have it, I'd really apreciate seeing it." 
This 
> > was her chance to check on her old friends to see how they're 
> holding 
> > up.
> >

> careful

telepathic
